== Normal Flow ==

 # User can change one of the following informations:
    * Username (Prefilled)
    * Password (Empty)
    * Repassword (Empty)
    * Fullname  (Prefilled)
    * Email  (Prefilled)
    * Gender  (Preselected)
    * Birthday (Prefilled)
    * Set of categories (Preselected)
 # User submits the form
 # All attributes are validated according to the constraints (See [DomainModelUser here] for more details)
 # If all attributes provided are valid, informations of the current user are updated according to the provided informations
 # User is redirected to the [PageShowMessages show message page]
